inxi -`<`color`>` -`<`option`>`

  * ie {{{ inxi -c4 -I}}}
      * this will change to color 4 and give inxi Information

----
*irc-client usage*
----
Konversation:
  * first link or move inxi into the [http://code.google.com/p/inxi/wiki/Installation Konversations script folder]
  * then run:
     * /inxi -`<`color`>` -`<`option`>`
----
X-Chat:
  * /exec -o inxi -`<`color`>` -`<`option`>`
    * the -o option show output to the channel.  Without it, only the user will see the output.
----
`WeeChat`:
  * download the [http://weechat.flashtux.org/plugins.php plugins package] follow direction on `WeeChat`
    * user may choose only the exec.pl (the only required script to run inxi)
  * then run:
     * /exec -o inxi -`<`color`>` -`<`option`>`n>
       * the -o option show output to the channel.  Without it, only the user will see the output.
----
